name: Marching Band Parade
description:
Are you ready to guide the parade through the city??
Will you be brave enough to guide the whole band till the end? Let’s find out!

Credits:

  • Davide De Gennaro - 

    https://twitter.com/Dege - Code & Level Design

  • Lorenzo Stanco - 

    https://twitter.com/lorenzostanco - Code & Music & UI

  • Serena Mantovani - 

    https://twitter.com/89sere89 - Graphics & Level Design & Food

Thanks for the help to:
Nicola Alberini, Dario Mori, Maria Laura Ligabue.

How to play:

  • Click and drag a musician to change his direction.

  • Click and release to make him stop.

  • ESC or P to pause the game.

  • Don’t lose anyone or the music will fade out!
